data.subject: World War IV (To The Floor)
data.lyric:
I could be your sugar daddy
 You could be my sugar mama
 Without a dollar
 No water
 
 We'd have eve

data.subject: True Believer
data.lyric:
We walked the days, we talk for miles
 We shared the story, it made us smile
 But the world is going

data.subject: Regular World
data.lyric:
A regular guy, regular size
 Regular drink, regular fries
 A regular pesticide
 A regular car, a reg
